title: Looking for this font! Any clues. Need precise font!
content:
Not sure why this is required

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_47452.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017083841/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_47452.jpg) | 57.62 KB |
author: jamone594

comments.content: i believe it's [Edwardian Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017083841/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/edwardian-script/std-regular/) with an alternate F. looks like they may have "fattened" it up a bit with a stroke to stand out on the dark background.

Here is Edwardian script from the fonts bundled with Microsoft Office 2011 for Mac:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017083841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ferreira_3473.png)
